name: UFO... GO HOME! (to dance)
description:
- Fish the dancing Alien with your ship. 
- It's a long way, so keep your energy! 
- Enjoy the party

----
The game came up meanwhile I was doing it. A couple of mechanics were sided away, but in general I feel proud. This game is the first solo videogame that I published.  Started as a #TriJam game, but I wasted a lot of time doing art and trashy portal mechanics. 

The theme was inspired by this weekend #minijam theme : UFO and fishing.

Potato.
